choices.text:
### Human:
Put together a healthy meal plan for me for today presuming no dietary restrictions.
### Assistant:

Based on your dietary preferences, I have created a sample meal plan for you:

Breakfast:
- Oatmeal with fresh berries and almond milk
- Avocado toast on whole grain bread with a side of sliced tomatoes

Lunch:
- Grilled chicken breast with roasted sweet potatoes and steamed broccoli
- Lentil soup with a side salad made with mixed greens and a variety of colorful veggies

Dinner:
- Grilled salmon with roasted asparagus and quinoa
- Stir-fry vegetables with tofu and brown rice

Snack:
- Carrots and hummus on whole grain crackers
- Greek yogurt with fresh fruit

Remember to always check the labels of packaged foods for any hidden sugars or unhealthy ingredients. Also, feel free to adjust the meal plan based on your specific dietary needs and preferences.
